channel.title: Delta Question

item.title: Delta Question
item.description:
@360236 wrote:

I put this command in NPCHandlers and he doesn’t talk.

[CODE]

                if (npcs[i].npcType == 409) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome

Realm-Scape!";[/CODE]

He is suppose to say “Welcome To Realm-Scape” but he says nothing. I am used to coding in allstar so I am confused…

All help appreciated.

Sincerely,

                   Chris

Read full topic
